item.title: Linked List. Algorithms series
item.description: A Linked List is fundamental and incredibly useful. It enables implementation of bags, queues and stacks. It is a recursive data structure. In the core of Linked List is Node that contains of generic item and reference to the next node. Node abstraction would be a nested class in Linked List and would look like this: private static class Node<E> { E value; Node<E> next; public Node(E value) { this.
